Propane.Description: Propane and butane are both commonly used as alternative fuels in various applications.
Propane is used as a fuel source in propane-powered vehicles, which offer lower emissions compared to gasoline-powered vehicles.
Propane is commonly used as a fuel for outdoor grills, providing convenient and efficient cooking.
Propane is often used as a fuel for portable heaters, offering warmth in various settings.
Propane and isobutane are both alkane hydrocarbons, commonly used as fuels.
